casebody.data:
JP MORGAN CHASE BANK, National Association, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Charles SEWARD a/k/k Charles D. Seward, his Heirs, Devisees, and Personal Representatives and his/her, their, or any of their Successors in Right, Title and Interest, Bobbie Seward, his Wife, her Heirs, Devisees, and Personal Representatives and his/her, their, or any of their Successors in Right, Title and Interest, Defendants-petitioners. C-814 September Term 2017
080717 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001089-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
